summary: New characters: Alyeonovna Karamazov. New connections: Alexei–Katerina (friend), Alyeonovna–Alyosha (romantic connection).
summary_short: Introduces Alyeonovna Karamazov. Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (28 ties). Key relationship types: friend, romantic connection.
highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (28), Dmitri Karamazov (25), Fyodor Karamazov (24), Ivan Karamazov (20)
story_summary: Alyosha encounters his brother Dmitri at a crossroad, where Dmitri reveals his inner turmoil and plans to carry out a dishonorable act. Alyosha visits the monastery and learns that Father Zossima is gravely ill, resolving to stay with him despite prior commitments. Before sleeping, Alyosha reads a secret love letter from Lise, which brings him unexpected joy and peace.
evidence_quotes: ‘I shall carry out my base plan, and you can bear witness’
‘He is weaker, a drowsiness has come over him,’ Father Païssy whispered
